EnhancedContent:
Before API 35 it was ok. I am using .NET 9, Android API 35, using Shell, etc.

- I have tried: Shell.NavBarIsVisible, NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar, theme tweaks, etc.
- What’s still happening: Title bar remains visible on Android.
Description:
Before API 35 it was ok. I am using .NET 9, Android API 35, using Shell, etc.

- I have tried: Shell.NavBarIsVisible, NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar, theme tweaks, etc.
- What’s still happening: Title bar remains visible on Android.
Title: MAUI Android API 35: Action Bar still visible despite NavBarIsVisible=False
Author: manjit
